nodes.text: A skyfighter was a combat vessel that was used solely for air-to-air combat. The Exocron Airfleet used skyfighters extensively, operating both the Skylark and the Skyraptor. The Corsairs of the western canyons also flew skyfighters called Raiders.
Skyfighters were used during the Conquest of Makeb by forces of the InterStellar Regulators under the Warhound.
